title: California School Library Recovery Act Project
short: Asking for 1.5% of Prop 98, this ballot initiative can provide funding for the school libraries Californiaâ€™s students need and deserve.
description:
The proposed Delaine Eastin School Library Recovery act will take 1.5% of Prop 98 funds and apply them to school libraries and districts in California.

Our goal is to raise $2M in campaign funding to develop sound polling on the proposed ballot initiative, assess voter attitude in order to draft the initiative and grow popular support. Funds will go towards research, legal costs, campaign infrastructure,  petitions and outreach, and voter outreach.
organization: California School Library Recovery Act Project
